simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified IF the Chorus receives the request 0xC012 - Reset Customer Parameters with RoutineControlOption is 0x02 Cancel_writing_of_secured_data
THEN The Chorus shall provide a positive response 0x71 0x01 0xC012 <RoutineInfo> <RoutineStatusRecord>
with RoutineInfo = 0x24 according to Q-LAH_80124-8971 (CorrectResults, RoutineFinishedCorrectly) and RoutineStatusRecord = 0x01 End_of_writing_of_secured_data_canceled_successfull.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21440 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified IF the calculated SHA-256 hash is different from the Hash received in "Absicherungsinformation"
THEN The Chorus shall provide a positive response 0x71 0x01 0xC012 <RoutineInfo> <RoutineStatusRecord>
with RoutineInfo = 0x14 according to Q-LAH_80124-8971 (IncorrectResults, RoutineFinishedCorrectly) and RoutineStatusRecord = 0x02 End_of_writing_of_secured_data_not_successful
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21441 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified IF the an error occurred in the cache processing loop
THEN The Chorus shall provide a positive response 0x71 0x01 0xC012 <RoutineInfo> <RoutineStatusRecord>
with RoutineInfo = 0x14 according to Q-LAH_80124-8971 (IncorrectResults, RoutineFinishedCorrectly) and RoutineStatusRecord = 0x02 End_of_writing_of_secured_data_not_successful
Additional Information: Errors are e.g. - writing a DID to a subsystem failed - writing 0x0250 to a subsystem failed - DID 0x0251 was incorrect - DID 0x0250 contained DIDs not marked as Configuration Hash relevant
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21442 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified IF no error occurred in the cache processing loop
THEN The Chorus shall provide a positive response 0x71 0x01 0xC012 <RoutineInfo> <RoutineStatusRecord>
with RoutineInfo = 0x24 according to Q-LAH_80124-8971 (CorrectResults, RoutineFinishedCorrectly) and RoutineStatusRecord = 0x00 End_of_writing_of_secured_data_finished_successful
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21443 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
